member.name: F:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeViewData.Nodes
member.summary: Array of TreeNodeData objects representing the root nodes in a TreeView.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeViewData.#ctor(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView)
member.summary: Creates new instance of the TreeViewData structure based from the specified TreeView.
member.param: TreeView to build the TreeViewData instance from.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeViewData.PopulateTree(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView)
member.summary: Populates the specified TreeView with the current TreeViewData instance.

member.name: T:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeViewData
member.summary: TreeViewData structure represents the root node collection of a TreeView and provides the PopulateTreeView function to add these nodes to a specified TreeView instance.
member.remarks: This class is serializable.

member.name: F:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeNodeData.Text
member.summary: String representing the Text property of the TreeNode.

member.name: F:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeNodeData.Value
member.summary: String representing the Value property of the TreeNode.

member.name: F:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeNodeData.ImageURL
member.summary: URL representing the icon file displayed next to the TreeNode.

member.name: F:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeNodeData.Checked
member.summary: Boolean representing the Checked state of the TreeNode.

member.name: F:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeNodeData.ChildNodes
member.summary: Array of TreeNodeData objects representing the root nodes in a TreeView.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeNodeData.#ctor(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode)
member.summary: Creates new instance of the TreeNodeData structure based on the specified TreeNode.
member.param: TreeNode to build the TreeNodeData instance from.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeNodeData.ToTreeNode
member.summary: Returns as TreeNode built from the instance of the TreeNodeData object.

member.name: T:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.TreeNodeData
member.summary: TreeNodeData structure represents a TreeNode and provides the ToTreeNode function to convert the instance to a TreeNode object.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.LoadTreeViewData(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView,System.String)
member.summary: Populates the specified TreeView from the serialized TreeViewData structure file specified.
member.param: Path to XML file to deserialize TreeView data.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess.SaveTreeViewData(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the specified TreeView in serialized TreeViewData structure file specified.
member.param: Path to XML file to serialize TreeView data.

member.name: T:Hacksaw.TreeViewDataAccess
member.summary: The TreeViewDataAccess class allows the nodes within a TreeView to be serialized to XML for later retrevial. Many thanks to Tom John's article over at CodeProject (http://www.codeproject.com/vb/net/TreeViewDataAccess.asp) for the initial code used in building this app. I've only modified it a bit to make it web component compatible to serve HackSaw's needs.

member.name: T:Hacksaw.HacksawTables.LogEventDataTable
member.summary: Represents the strongly named DataTable class.

member.name: T:Hacksaw.HacksawTables
member.summary: Represents a strongly typed in-memory cache of data.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.BindLogSources
member.summary: Retrieves log sources and binds to the TreeView for selection.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.AddLogFolder(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Adds a folder node to the TreeView.
member.param: Add Log Folder Button Click Event.
member.remarks: Folder nodes do not link to log files, they serve for grouping purposes.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.AddLogNode(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Adds a log node to the TreeView
member.param: Add Log Node Button Click Event
member.remarks: Log nodes contain the path to the XML file to view.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.SaveTree(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Saves the log sources TreeView to an XML file.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.ReloadTree(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Loads log sources XML file into the TreeView.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.ProcessNode(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Processes the appropriate action when a Node in the TreeView is clicked.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.DeleteNode(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.remarks: If a folder node is deleted, all child log nodes will automatically be deleted.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.UpdateNode(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Updates selected node to the new name/path specified by the user.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.MoveNodeUp(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Moves the selected node up in the tree.
member.param: Move Node Up Button Click Event.
member.remarks: A node cannot move up in the heirarchy of the tree. It can only move up amongst the child nodes it is a part of.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.MoveNodeDown(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Moves the selected node down in the tree.
member.param: Move Node Down Button Click Event.
member.remarks: A node cannot move down in the heirarchy of the tree. It can only move up amongst the child nodes it is a part of.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.ClearTextBoxes
member.summary: Sets all TextBoxes Text parameter to blank.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.ManageLogSources.ClearAllButSelectedTextBoxes
member.summary: Sets all TextBoxes Text parameter to blank except for those relating to the selected node.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.HackSawDAL.LoadLog(System.String)
member.summary: Method loads data from file specified using log4j-events XML schema.
member.param: Full path of file to load.
member.remarks: By default, log4j/log4net log files are appended in a "malformed" format since there is no root XML header or footer tags included. This method will stream the file in, apply the appropriate header/footer, and then pass this "properly formed" XML information to the DataSet for loading. The header and footer tags are located in seperate files to allow for future header changes without recompiling the application.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.HackSawDAL.SaveLogTree(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView)
member.summary: Serializes the TreeView object specified into an XML file.
member.remarks: Method uses the TreeViewDataAccess class to facilitate translation of the TreeView into a serializable object. The XML file used for serialization is located in the configuration file (web.config).

member.name: M:Hacksaw.HackSawDAL.LoadLogTree(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView)
member.summary: Deserializes the XML file specified in the configuration into the TreeView object specified.
member.remarks: Method uses the TreeViewDataAccess class to facilitate translation of the TreeView into a serializable object. The XML file used for deserialization is located in the configuration file (web.config).

member.name: M:Hacksaw.HackSawDAL.IsLogFile(System.String,System.Collections.ArrayList)
member.summary: Determines if the value specified contains a valid log file extension in its name.
member.returns: Boolean indicating if value contains a proper extension in it.
member.remarks: Method uses the LogExtensions ArrayList in the user's session to compare against.

member.name: T:Hacksaw.HackSawDAL
member.summary: This class serves as the data access layer for the HackSaw application. All processes involving loading data from a file or dataset function through this class.

member.name: P:Hacksaw.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Hacksaw.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Hacksaw.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.BindLogSources
member.summary: Retrieves log sources and binds to the TreeView for selection.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.BindLogFile
member.summary: Loads log file stored in ViewState variable and binds to GridView for display. Display options stored in ViewState are applied to GridView.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ChangeGridPage(System.Object,System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs)
member.summary: Changes GridView page to page specified.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ChangeGridSort(System.Object,System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs)
member.summary: Changes GridView sort to column specified.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ApplyOptions(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Stores settings in ViewState variables and applies changes to GridView.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.RefreshGridView(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Refreshes the GridView without resetting the sort/paging attributes.
member.remarks: Method redirects to the BindLogFile method.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ProcessNode(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Processes the appropriate action when a Node in the TreeView is clicked.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ShowHideLogTree(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Shows/Hides Log Sources TreeView based on current state.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.StartAdvancedSearch(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Applies the filter criteria specified to the grid view and refreshes the display.
member.remarks: Method sets the GridFilter ViewState parameter and calls the BindLogFile method.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ClearAdvancedSearch(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Clears the filter applied to the grid view and refreshes the display.
member.remarks: Method resets the GridFilter ViewState parameter to blank and calls the BindLogFile method.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.StartBasicSearch(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Creates a grid view filter based on user basic search parameters and refreshes the display.
member.remarks: Method sets the GridFilter ViewState parameter and calls the BindLogFile method.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ClearBasicSearch(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Clears the filter applied to the basic search and refreshes the display.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.StartKeywordSearch(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Creates a grid view filter based on user keyword search parameters and refreshes the display.
member.remarks: Method sets the GridFilter ViewState parameter and calls the BindLogFile method.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ClearKeywordSearch(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Clears the filter applied to the keyword search and refreshes the display.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.TickUpdateGrid(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Calls the BindLogFile method to refresh the GridView.
member.remarks: Interval of update is controlled based on ViewState information and user options.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ManualLoadLog(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Loads the log files specified for viewing.
member.remarks: This method runs when the user does not use the saved log sources TreeView and types in the log source instead.

member.name: M:Hacksaw.Main.ManageLogs(System.Object,System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs)
member.summary: Redirects the user to the Manage Log Sources page.
member.param: Manage Log Sources ImageButton Click Event.
